name: 123TapTapTap
description:
123 Tap allows you to make quick and easy decisions with your friends! Just tap and you're ready to go! Touch is like eenie meenie miney mo but for the 21st century. Fantastic for making decisions or selecting only one person from a group to do something.

Setup:
Let each friend tap the screen. Once all of your friends have tapped the screen tap on the "start" button. Touch will then randomly select a friend that is tapping the screen.

*** How to use:
- Touch && hold with multi(>2) fingers on the screen to start.
